summary: This is an email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) forwarding a memo and the Non-Prosecution Agreement (NPA) from the Florida prosecution of Jeffrey Epstein. It references an upcoming update on the investigation since March 2019.

events.title: Status memo sent to ODAG
events.description: A status memo regarding the Jeffrey Epstein investigation was sent to the Office of the Deputy Attorney General (ODAG).

events.title: Email forwarding Florida NPA and memo
events.description: An email is sent attaching the Florida Non-Prosecution Agreement and a status memo, with a promise of an updated investigation memo to follow.

keyFacts: The email attaches the Non-Prosecution Agreement (NPA) from the Florida prosecution of Jeffrey Epstein.
A status memo regarding the Epstein investigation was sent to the Office of the Deputy Attorney General (ODAG) around March 12, 2019.
The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York planned to send an updated memo on their investigation later on April 26, 2019.
